text:
An expert on the 1918 Spanish Flu epidemic wrote a piece 2 yrs ago on lessons of why that outbreak was so deadly.

His conclusion: govt officials, desperate to keep morale up during WWI, didn't tell the truth.

And because the govt lied, more people died. https://t.co/zUSFUwvLDt

urls.title: How the Horrific 1918 Flu Spread Across America
urls.description: The toll of history’s worst epidemic surpasses all the military deaths in World War I and World War II combined. And it may have begun in the United States
